content: this square is simple to construct using only basic stitches and a few front post trebles yet she will add an element of charm to any project perfect for the advanced beginner or adventurous beginner samples crocheted in mostly caron simply soft with an h/5 0mm hook and moderate gauge measured 12 if you ve crocheted my squares before you re probably used to them coming in under the 12 mark this tends to be because i am a rather loose hooker you may find this square to be a little different you ll notice i decreased my hook size and i recommend you check your gauge my squares that measured exactly 12 were 4 5 at the widest part of round 4 erratum now corrected as of 4/12/17 6 inch version round 6 currently reads standing single_crochet in the second single_crochet of any 20 single_crochet group… but should read standing single_crochet in the second single_crochet of any 7 single_crochet group visit me and stay up to date with more patterns and discounts by following my facebook page every trick on the hook 1 please check out my other patterns in my ravelry store here 2 1 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook 2 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
